attribute-processor.name: bundle-includes
attribute-processor.documentation: Comma-separated list of bundles to activate in the current request.

attribute-processor.name: bundle-excludes
attribute-processor.documentation: Comma-separated list of bundles to exclude from the current request.

attribute-processor.name: js-excludes
attribute-processor.documentation: Comma-separated list of JavaScript assets to exclude from the current request.

attribute-processor.name: css-excludes
attribute-processor.documentation: Comma-separated list of CSS assets to exclude from the current request.

attribute-processor.name: placeholder-include
attribute-processor.documentation: Placeholder used to tell Dandelion where to inject the corresponding assets. Assets will be injected into the corresponding element.

attribute-processor.name: placeholder-replace
attribute-processor.documentation: Placeholder used to tell Dandelion where to inject the corresponding assets. Assets will replace the corresponding element.
